about_the_game:
If you enjoy our game, and you want to contribute to the ongoing development, this pack is the best way you can express your support to our team!

Bring Me that Shawarma – Supporter Pack includes:

  • Bonus episode “Shawarma Snuff” (WILL BE AVAILABLE JULY 2024)
  • High-resolution arts
  • Artwork and photos without post-processing
  • History of the project creation with comments from the developers
  • Infinite love from the authors
  • New episodes will be able to come out faster!

Thank you for your support!

You can find the DLC content inside your Steam game folder.
